code: import _toConsumableArray from"/Users/sj2/gitDesk/RespBlog/client/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray.js";var storyReducer=function storyReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"FETCH_ALL_STORIES":return action.payload;case"CREATE_STORY":return[].concat(_toConsumableArray(state),[action.payload]);case"UPDATE_STORY":return state.map(function(story){return story._id===action.payload._id?action.payload:story;});case"DELETE_STORY":return state.filter(function(story){return story._id!==action.payload;});default:return state;}};export default storyReducer;
